IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE FUNCTION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS TO COLLECT MONEY FOR THE INDIGENT. SUCH COLLECTIONS ARE FROM THOSE WHOSE HEART POURS OUT IN SYMPATHY TO THOSE LESS FORTUNATE WHO CANNOT GET BY ON A DAILY BASIS WITH BASIC LIVING NECESSITIES. THE OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION, THE DIRECTORS, AND THEIR FAMILIES ARE NOT IN ANY WAY ELIGIBLE FOR ANY ASSISTANCE. .
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE FUNCTION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS TO COLLECT MONEY FOR THE INDIGENT. SUCH COLLECTIONS ARE FROM THOSE WHOSE HEART POURS OUT IN SYMPATHY TO THOSE LESS FORTUNATE WHO CANNOT GET BY ON A DAILY BASIS WITH BASIC LIVING NECESSITIES. THE OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION, THE DIRECTORS, AND THEIR FAMILIES ARE NOT IN ANY WAY ELIGIBLE FOR ANY ASSISTANCE. .
IRS990.Desc: TO RAISE FUNDS TO DISTRIBUTE TO REPUTABLE ORGANIZATIONS AND INDIVIDUALS IN THE US AND ABROAD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEW EACH GRANT DISTRIBUTION AND CHECK IF THE ORGANIZATION EXEMPT SIMILAR TO THE IRC 501 C 3 EXEMPTION. THE ORGANIZATION IS FAMILIAR WITH THE WEBSITE OF OFAC (HTTP://WWW.USTREAS.GOV/OFFICES/ENFORCEMENT/KEYISSUES/PROTECTING/DOCS/GUIDE LINES CHARITIES.PDF) TO ENSURE THAT THE RECIPIENTS ARE NOT: I.ENGAGING IN TRADE OR TRANSACTION ACTIVITIES THAT VIOLATE REGULATIONS BEHIND OFAC'S COUNTRY-BASED SANCTIONS PROGRAMS, AND II.ENGAGING IN TRADE OR TRANSACTION ACTIVITIES WITH SANCTIONS TARGETS NAMED ON OFAC'S LIST OF SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONALS AND BLOCKED PERSONS (SONS).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 3

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION REVIEWS EACH CASE, AND MAKES SURE THAT EACH RECIPIENT ORGANIZATION IS AN EXEMPT ORGANIZATION ACCORDING TO IRC 501(C) (3). IN THE CASE OF GRANTS TO INDIVIDUALS, OTHER PROCEDURES ARE DONE WHICH ARE DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

THE FUNCTION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS TO COLLECT MONEY FOR THE INDIGENT. SUCH COLLECTIONS ARE FROM THOSE WHOSE HEART POURS OUT IN SYMPATHY TO THOSE LESS FORTUNATE WHO CANNOT GET BY ON A DAILY BASIS WITH BASIC LIVING NECESSITIES. THE OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION, THE DIRECTORS, AND THEIR FAMILIES ARE NOT IN ANY WAY ELIGIBLE FOR ANY ASSISTANCE. .
THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S ACCOUNTANT, REVIEWED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICERS AND BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND THEN THE BOARD APPROVES THE FORM 990.
THE POLICY IS REVIEWED AT THE ANNUAL MEETING. THE POLICY COVERS ALL DIRECTORS. THE DIRECTORS PROHIBIT ANY DIRECTOR VOTING SHOULD HE HAVE A SUBSTANTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST.
THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, DISCLOSURE DOCUMENTS AND CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION: UPON REQUEST. .

LIFE INSURANCE-CASH VALUE THE AMOUNT OF LIFE INSURANCE-CASH VALUE REPRESENTS ACCUMULATED CASH VALUE ON LIFE INSURANCE CONTRACTS. THE INSURANCE POLICY IS ON THE LIFE OF A KEY DIRECTOR AND THE ORGANIZATION IS THE BENEFICIARY.
